pageTitle: Hotel Mitsui Ginza Premier, Tokyo, Japan - Booking.com
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {11940=A buffet breakfast is served at Sky restaurant from 7 am - 10 am (no entry after 9:30 am), for a fee, and the restaurant also serves lunch and dinner. Drinks and light refreshments can be enjoyed at Karin Bar., 13017=Offering high-floor views of the city and Tokyo Bay, Mitsui Garden Hotel Ginza Premier provides chic and stylish rooms that went through a renovation in March 2013. It is a 4-minute walk from Shinbashi Station and a 10-minute walk from the Ginza area. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property., 11356=We speak your language! Laundry and dry cleaning services are also available. Guests can use internet PCs at the lobby for free.}
